snippet: The AMC program crushed even the N.F.L. on Sunday night among the 18-49 demographic. Also, the networks reported improved ratings for the premiere week.
abstract: AMC program The Walking Dead, in its fifth season premiere, draws 17.3 million viewers as most-watched drama in cable television history; four broadcast networks also report improved ratings for the premiere week.
lead_paragraph: The AMC program crushed even the N.F.L. on Sunday night among the 18-49 demographic. Also, the networks reported improved ratings for the premiere week.

headline.main: ‘Walking Dead’ Season 5 Draws 17 Million Viewers in Premiere, a Record for a Cable TV Drama
headline.print_headline: ‘Walking Dead’ Premiere Tops 17 Million Viewers, Setting Record for a Cable Drama
